twitch_info.title: I Wanna Potato 2.5: Whispers of the Needle Gods - Part 4 - Final!
twitch_info.description:
After 5-6 years from download, we are finally done! \o/
Epic game! :D

message.body: Just not playing ex piano well enough to get any good attempts atm
Yeah I hate when that happens.
nearly 7 hours of ex piano before that happened
I love how they use the title theme in the final area
I Wanna Potato 2.5's final area before the boss ye
I don't think I've seen this game before, assumed it was a single song game.
ah no this game has lots of soundtrack
this is probably the most basic looking area in the game LUL
I never did reach stage 7 in SAN because Flandre's locus pattern pissed me off
I clearly wasn't skilled enough back then anyway
I could do it now for sure but cba
Did you conquer the 1st phase of piano
This game is filled with hard needle tho
couldn't get any more good attempts
forget how hard these saves are LUL
actually how do you do that jump
I guess it's you don't bonk
Also, I don't know if you're genuinely asking, or if it's just phrase moment.
You can get over the spike with a bonk, you just have to be closer to the edge.
Also just realized I had crazy stream delay, was lurking.
oh yeah, I actually have a question about stream delay actually
does changing it to no delay actually change how much bandwidth etc is being used or does it just change how fast viewers see it?
Cause if it's the latter, I'll switch it over to no delay
I don't know much about low latency mode, all I know is it reduces stream delay from one time I tried it out.
I need to know if it puts extra strain on the streamer
otherwise delay is what we live with LUL
Yeah I have no idea if it does or not.
yeah, I'll keep it as-is then for now
there we go that's a better pixel position LUL
There is an avoidance at the end I wanted try out since like
Is the final screen an epic 1 screen save?
not sure if epic is the word to go for as it has like 6 boxed rooms
Scramble had an epic final 1 screen save though
This music still reminds me of that claymation 2.5d shmup Platypus though.
I like that these saves help me improv ein needle tho
That last jump looks really hard lol
and this is the fucked ifnal screen LUL
like I said epic wasn't the word
there was an epic transition screen between 1st and 2nd hub in this game tho
Bro it's like the 9 trials, that's so epic
problem isI don't know how to do a nerfed version
It's way easier than a double diamond
Though if you're not used to the inputs, I imagine it'd be kinda weird to pull off?
normally I'd just do it normally and take the L
Shoutouts to the notes at the end of the song btw
You gotta like, single jump over the first 2 spikes, then double jump bonk over the last one.
that does seem kind of hard
the needle in this game has been quite challenging for sure tho
There was an upwards plane a little into a save once as a funny
uplanes in save are always hilarious
The one in K3 Secret 3 can kiss my a$$ tho
don't do that in a bad corner save
What about the one at the end of extra screen 2?
Hm, combination of factors in regard to mic.
you can beat ex piano in 50 hours
oh ye I didn't change stream title to iwanna potato 2.5
But I did ex piano for about 7 hours today
I just realised why my strat doesn't work
I assume you bonk but you don't LUL
ironically that nerfd buffed the save for me
I guess you can think of it like a single jump half diamond.
>proceeds to do it first try in jtool
How much more is after that?
looks like a decent chunk ngl
and more like you dodge on platform rather than colonel
only took 10 hours 26 minutes of needle to get here
nah the needle in this game was based
I love how smooth the bullets are in this boss
what the fuck even is the WEIRD movements
creative way of increasing difficulty I admit but WutFace
after platform is final which is the yellow colonels hots
I originally played this game for the avoidance and could never reach it
but nowadays I appreciate the needle of this game
never thought I'd have an avoidance confuse me on how to read it ever again
This really was the right time for me to pick up this game again
reminds me that there are better avoidances out there than the shit K3 has put me through LUL
I Wanna Potato 2.5: Whispers of the Needle Gods
I believ eon del-fruit it's just I Wanna Potato
the anime girl make no sense
idk how her leg be doin that
Does grinding avoidance just destroy your ability to type
if I type during an attempt but still keep playing just fine yeah
WOAH did not expect THAT transition
It's the avoidance at the end. This is quite a long needle game to grind
But it's a short game if you're good lmao
spent like 2 hours on it in total
I actually really liked the needle in this game, buuuuuuuut
It took me a long time to get skilled enough to play it LUL
I downloaded this game like 6 years ago
one of the saves required knowing jump cancelling, which I only know thanks to K3 LUL
honestly numpad cancelling is not as scary as it sounds and pretty fun when you know it
but learning it is uh, an experience
yea maybe ill play needle one day but as of now im a deep rooted needle hater sadly
didnt get any good attenpt except the one earlier
ye I didn't get any attempts into 2nd phase
so we both had a subpar day LUL
i still have the eradem cam active tho
but I finished off the final area of potato 2.5 and am doing its avoidance and that's been great
it's crazy to think I downloaded this game 6 years ago
and now here I am finally playing its boss LUL
shame, was nearly a final attempt
the final attack is omega based which has me convined I'm going to love 2nd phase ex colonel.
butI also loved colonel in k3 boss rush so
the ex version is just gonna be great LUL
that should give me enough strength to push through ex piano and ex dotkid
which uses the colonel yellow circles mmmmmmmmm
final attack is just a m a z i n g
and I can't wait to play ex colonel now as a result LUL
however I gotta stick to my K3 order
which is EX Piano > EX Dotkid > EX Colonel > EX Emperor
cause if I don't do ex piano and dotkid first I won't ever do them so
ex piano is so shit tho
